name: Star Seeker (Exator)
description:
Ludum Dare 45 Entry

Experience the birth of the universe and help the "Celestials" find their constellations and secure their corner of the universe.

- Left-Click, hold and drag to connect stars

- Right-Click on star to clear connections

** If you experience performance issues with the web version, please download the Windows version if possible as it doesn't have that issue.
